website_summaries.verdict: A little saucepan for making delicate sauces or cooking for one or two. Another high-quality option from Le Creuset.
pros: Available in many colors, this saucepan slowly and evenly heats up so sauces won't burn
It's sturdy and easy to clean
It boasts the same high-quality construction as other Le Creuset cookware
cons: There's no spout for pouring sauces and it's quite small

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Had a large Creuset pan, which we use all the time and bought this matching pot. Not only is it great for cooking, it also serves as an alternative method for working the lower/upper arm muscles...seems to be made of the same metal that Thor's hammer is made of...you must be truly worthy to lift this thing.
customer_reviews.author: GradStudent

customer_reviews.title: Two saucepans, both with cosmetic defects
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in white from Amazon, and the first one that arrived had a divot and nicks on the inside of the pan. I returned that and the replacement I ordered arrived with a scratch in the enamel on the handle. For a $185 saucepan I expect better quality control from Le Creuset. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is the quality that I expect from Le Creuset. I like this - it's great for making a small-family portion of soup, or heating up pasta sauce (it holds 2 jars of pasta sauce).
customer_reviews.author: Educated Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great little saucepan
customer_reviews.text: Have two other Caribbean le creuset Dutch ovens. Bought this as a warehouse deal. Great price, probably lower than le creuset outlet. Thought maybe I’d want the bigger saucepan but this is the perfect size. If I need something bigger I would just use my 4 qt anyway. Plus the bigger saucepan would also be heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Safest most inert cookware available
customer_reviews.text: After much research, i have concluded that cast iron and enameled cast iron are the most inert cookware you can use. That makes it the safest too. I loved these saucepans so much that i bought different sizes. They are truly beautiful as well as functional.
customer_reviews.author: DLG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful saucepan but why "Le Creuset" printed all over it?
customer_reviews.text: I love this saucepan! Beautiful, gorgeous coloring, perfectly made. I plan to use it often. However, my review is because "Le Creuset" is imprinted on this small pan in four places: the lid, lid knob, handle, and the bottom. This was not visible to me when viewing online. I find this distracting and thus a bit annoying. Wouldn't the bottom and knob, or bottom and lid, be enough? I'll be buying more enameled cast iron ware and may return to Le Creuset but will now first look for other manufacturers' if I can find one are as good without all the labeling. If other buyers do not mind this, it is a perfect pan indeed.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Good for cooking grains and sauces
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cook rice, oatmeal, and quinoa. It is perfect for that. Can also be used to cook small batch sauces. I have Le Creuset from the 70’s that I still use and love. This is a great addition. Expensive but worth it. The handle gets very hot but they make a slip on handle holder for 10 bucks that works well. The older pots like this had wood handles that don’t get hot. Progress? Not really. Give me the old ones, but what can you do? Probably now made in China vs the old Made in France Le Creuset. Still a good pot though.
customer_reviews.author: photogirl

customer_reviews.title: Le Creuset is the best
customer_reviews.text: Le Creuset makes the best cookware hands down. We have many different sizes but never had a small saucepan. They look fantastic too but that is just the icing on the cake. They work well from stove to oven, retain heat, and clean up easily. Save up and invest. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: lolalafonda

customer_reviews.title: Immediate favorite
customer_reviews.text: This lovely, cheery little pan quickly became the one I reach for first, for slow or prolonged cooking, for 1-to-3-person servings. I don't know why it took me so long to finally indulge in Le Creuset. Worth every dollar, capable of being a pot to last in generations of family.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Hardesty

customer_reviews.title: very happy with mine
customer_reviews.text: no defects at all. perfect size for what i wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for two people!
customer_reviews.text: It's a Le Creuset, so you probably know the quality of this product. I'll just say that it's great for one or two people -- probably a little small if you're cooking a dish for more than two people. We're using this with an induction stovetop and it works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been waiting a long time to buy this pot and it was certain worth the wait! I own a le creuset dutch oven and fell in love with the brand. Only quality from this company. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Keri C.

customer_reviews.title: Great cookware, be careful with metal utensils.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works great. It's a very versatile little saucepan that I use to cook everything that fit. Just a little heavy for the volume it holds, but that is expected for a sturdy cast iron pot. Be careful that metal utensils can leave ugly marks inside (I learned it from a hard way, so I'd like to share here). I don't think they're real scratch marks. They looked more like metallic stains, so only cosmetic problem.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: These pans are wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these pans so much she was happy to get this as a Christmas gift! They cook evenly, can go from stove top to the oven, and can be washed in the dishwasher. These are her favorites and will be buying more as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pans
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pan for oatmeal or rice. This pan is very sturdy and holds the heat well and I love the color. I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Missy12

customer_reviews.title: works for now
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I bought this expensive pan. Love the color and the feel. Hope it holds up because I have had some trouble lately with the enamel wearing off some of their other pans. My guess is that they used to have better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: california woman

customer_reviews.title: Love this Saucepan
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and should last a lifetime. Great reputation from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos H. Davila Jr.

customer_reviews.title: What can I say--it's LeCreuset!
customer_reviews.text: Except for the weight, I love everything about LeCreuset pots and pans. My kids will enjoy them long after I'm gone.
customer_reviews.author: Collie Lover

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful small saucepan for our induction stove.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful small saucepan for our induction stove. Works perfectly and is a pan we will have forever.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Marmar

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: Last one went for 27 years, then we burnt the bottom beyond repair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Having several other LC products with this color, I had a good idea of what to expect. The size is just right and the heftiness is as expected. I will enjoy giving this item as a gift and the recipient is sure to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Abby W.

customer_reviews.title: Cooks my veggies perfectly every time. Tried many pots ...
customer_reviews.text: Cooks my veggies perfectly every time. Tried many pots and pans over the years. Nothing does for your food what LeCreuset will do. You cannot go wrong with any of their cast iron products.
customer_reviews.author: nehmeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a side dish
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a side dish, or a small pot of soup (for two). Easy to clean and of course...quality cookware. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: C. thayer

customer_reviews.title: Great for rice
customer_reviews.text: The heat is so even it makes cooking brown rice easy. It cleans easily. The handles get HOT!
customer_reviews.author: Jill McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and very much worth the extra cost for someone who likes to cook and takes pride in what he does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Great to have an extra handle on the opposite side as this pan is quite heavy. Cooks evenly and a great addition to any collection. Works great on my induction cook top. Cleans easily in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna  Claire Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Will last two lifetimes!
customer_reviews.text: I got a discount because there was a hole in the box!
customer_reviews.author: Morran

customer_reviews.title: Is better than previous model
customer_reviews.text: I had one four years ago, but this one has an even better design that seems roomier and has the open hole handle, too.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Dow

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, flawless cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cooking results and easy to clean. Love it. However, it is pretty heavy for a smallish pot.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Kroger

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this saucepan. It is perfect for small cooking tasks that require even heating. And the saucepan cleans up quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: g.walker

customer_reviews.title: Le Creuset turns out pretty dang perfect items
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to give anything other than a resounding 5 stars. Le Creuset turns out pretty dang perfect items. The handle of this DOES get hot, but it's a metal pot - of course it gets hot. I do understand why those silicone handles sell so well with these, however.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah K

customer_reviews.title: The best ever! Le Creuset is solid and makes the ...
customer_reviews.text: The best ever! Le Creuset is solid and makes the most beautiful sauces because of even temperatures. That is the key to great sauces. The best sauce pan ever. No burning, even temperature that lasts through the entire cooking time and delicious results.
customer_reviews.author: classical2

customer_reviews.title: they loved it.
customer_reviews.text: gift for my sister and brother inlaw, they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would have loved my pot had it not come cracked and chipped
customer_reviews.text: Would have loved my pot had it not come cracked and chipped. I have many Le Creuset pieces and I have never experienced this! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Bellaluxx

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not useful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but not useful. The saucepan is so small you could boil two eggs in it or cook up a modest broth without adding much more than a pinch of salt because anything more won't fit. And if you are such an austere cook, you'll still need the strength of Godzilla to lift this tiny pot. I wish I could just gaze at it, the color and finish are amazing. I have a Le Creuset Dutch oven, which is manageable for its size, but this baby is torture.
customer_reviews.author: Slumming Angel

customer_reviews.title: Le Creset Saucepan in color Dune
customer_reviews.text: Nice earthy color-different from the others. Know I have a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hay Preston

customer_reviews.title: Quality problems
customer_reviews.text: I own a LOT of Le Creuset pots. This particular pot had quality issues --- I had to send back 4 pots before the 5th one that Amazon sent was OK. The problem was thin glazing that let metal show through the blue! At the same time I ordered this pot, I also ordered other Le Creuset items, all of which were perfect. I think that the manufacturer has a glazing issue with this pot size. If you buy one of Le Creuset's wonderful pots, look it over for glazing defects, especially over the lettering on the handle and lid. One pot even came with a bit of rust on the metal where the glazing did not cover the metal.
customer_reviews.author: A Writer

customer_reviews.title: Love Le Creuset!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely addition to my collection. I also purchased the 3.25 quart saucepan and I think the 1.75 is the perfect size for rice, grits, oatmeal, quinoa, heating up leftovers etc. Best way to clean Le Creuset: soak for stuck on food, wipe clean with towel or soft sponge, use barkeepers friend to get remaining discoloration out if there is any. Only use wooden or silicone utensils. I love it! Have been using it multiple times daily! It’s super cute too! Don't be scared of the white color, its timeless and classic and maintains its beauty. This saucepan did arrive with a few small imperfections but I decided to keep it instead of going through the exchange process with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart Potss are  HIghly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This pot is wonderful . This was a replacement for a pot which I dropped accidentally and broke the handle. As I used the pot daily I had to replace it- despite. the cost. Cuisinart makes a superior product which makes me ing appear to be an expert cook Major advise to all is to be very careful as Cuisinart pots break when dropped. .
customer_reviews.author: Doris B. Onken

customer_reviews.title: size of a can of soup or a warming up something pretty small: )
customer_reviews.text: It's very small, size of a can of soup or a warming up something pretty small:)
customer_reviews.author: palmtrees&amp;pearls

customer_reviews.title: Perfect oatmeal, rice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect oatmeal, rice, and cream of wheat. Takes a bit longer to heat up, but well worth it! I should have bought this and other Le Creuset cookware years earlier! I loooove it!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy E. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small size, light weight and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and light weight. Just perfect for making rice, soups and gravy. I've just ordered the 2.25 qt so I have one just a bit larger. I cooked my onion and celery before adding the rest for my soup. When I went to wash the dishes I noticed it had brown spots where the onions had fried on the bottom. Well, I don't know why I got worried because it all came off easy with a scrubby sponge!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Love the Color
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure about the color but I love it. However, I am almost certain this was a previously opened product making me uncomfortable. I am questioning Amazon as I am hearing that this happens and there appears to be evidence here. Still, product was okay.
customer_reviews.author: Roadrunner

customer_reviews.title: LE Creuset 1-3/4 saucepan
customer_reviews.text: The Signature Series is the way to go . The real deal . Made in France where they know how to cook ( Been to Paris ) Do knot know how they could improve on this . Hightly Recommended .
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Robert

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with my old cast iron cookware, but tired of the cleaning process. I was ready for some enameled cast iron so I can clean it easily. I went for le creuset because it's the craftsman tool of the cookware industry. I was not disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Love the lamp

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy pot
customer_reviews.text: Like it a lot - my second. Only issue with light colored enamel is that it shows stains from black beans over time.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rice every time
customer_reviews.text: I use this small pot for cooking rice. The rice comes out perfectly every time. Just turn the temp down very low for success. And also, the pot is very easy to clean, saving your time.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pot
customer_reviews.text: my wifes favorite pot which is funny to hear that she has a favorite pot. Heats well but clean up is a super breeze, use wooden utensils or something like wood, metal is not very forgiving on the ceramic.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from Le Creuset!
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth Le Creuset piece and I love it! Bought this piece in cranberry and my other pieces in flame. I have a very colorful kitchen! Very high quality timeless pieces to be handed down for generations. They are pricey but over time they will more than pay for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: HollyTampaBay

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this product because it was very heavy. The large cook pot that I ordered is a dream
customer_reviews.author: Pam Wheary

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, excellent heat retention
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient pan when cooking for two. Beautiful color, excellent heat retention, and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been collecting the pots with the color Provence.it is a beautiful color.

customer_reviews.title: Great Saucepan
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good pan. A bit pricey but you get what you pay for. Will last forever. Enamel coated so not metal tools allowed.
customer_reviews.author: Enduro6X6

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous heavy duty pot
customer_reviews.text: Like my other Le Creuset pots, it cooks and cleans beautifully.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. With proper care, cooking and cleaning, one won't have a problem with this saucepan.
customer_reviews.author: ill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Well made and looks great. You can't beat Le Creuset...pride in craftsmanship.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this pot and any cast iron piece made in france by le creuset

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cookware
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in black and was the best price i could find. Excellent cookware
customer_reviews.author: LMT W.

customer_reviews.title: My new love!!
customer_reviews.text: Every home should have one of these little babies! The quality of the brand is well worth the price and YES it is the real thing! I know some sellers sell fake brands and this is not one of them. I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Green_Indigo

customer_reviews.title: Great saucepan
customer_reviews.text: My go to saucepan. Great for small jobs, cleans up really well even when abused.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Wonderful color. I use it all the time.

customer_reviews.title: Le Creuset
customer_reviews.text: It's Le Creuset the best cooking pots pans skillets cast iron the best for heat distribution it's wonderful!

customer_reviews.title: Best pot I've ever got!
customer_reviews.text: well made, works well, decorative and makes me feel like professional chef!

customer_reviews.title: Made to last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this little saucepan! It is very durable and beautiful. You can just tell it's made to last a lifetime.

customer_reviews.title: Saucy Signature Saucepan
customer_reviews.text: Oh absolutely Le Creuset Signature Cast Iron Saucepan exceeded my expectations. Le Creuset NEVER fails !

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic piece of cookware. Cooks evenly. Cleans up easily. Quality through and through.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great size, great for warming things up
customer_reviews.text: I use all the time, it's my most versatile Le Creuset pan. It's a great size, great for warming things up, or cooking in smaller batches, for day to day cooking. Easy to clean and looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Pierson

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful pot. It's strong and heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful pot. It's strong and heavy. Both handles heat up when using so pot holders are needed.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: expensive... but you can't miss with this ...
customer_reviews.text: expensive ... but you can't miss with this product .. A true classic
customer_reviews.author: neal oldendorp

customer_reviews.title: Le Creuset used to be my favorite until I discovered staub
customer_reviews.text: Le Creuset used to be my favorite until I discovered staub. Maybe it's the black color (since I've never noticed this before with any other le creuset pot), but it seemed for the first week I was smelling the enamel paint. I hate to say it, but I kind a wish I would've kept using my stainless steel/aluminum layered pot. Overall it's probably a little easier to clean then the stainless steel version, but it's also heavier.
customer_reviews.author: bobbler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Le Crueset! Arrived well, and is as expected, the quality and look I enjoy cooking with.
customer_reviews.author: Mercie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just love Le Creuset, and this is no exception. Fantastic products.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter who absolutely loves her Le Creuset set......one piece at a time!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had gotten this sooner. Am loving the cooking, clean and how nice it looks.

product_meta.title: Le Creuset Signature Enameled Cast Iron Saucepan, 1-3/4-Quart, Cerise
product_meta.description: Size:1 3/4 Quart| Color:CeriseThe smoothly curved interior and rounded base of the Signature saucepan make sauce making easier than ever, with no tight corners to trap ingredients - allowing them to blend easily. An extended helper handle and a contoured main handle also provide added control when transferring cookware on the stovetop or between the kitchen and the table. Crafted of durable cast iron and protected by Le Creuset's enhanced enameling, the Signature saucepan provides the optimal medium for sauce making with its precise and responsive temperature control properties. In fact, cast iron has long been used by chefs around the world to achieve the steady low-to-medium heat required for building delicate sauces.
feature_bullets: Rounded base helps ingredients blend easily while cooking
Extended helper handle provides added control when transferring
Superior heat distribution and retention of Le Creuset enameled cast iron
An advanced sand-colored interior enamel with even more resistance to wear
Colorful, long-lasting exterior enamel that resists chipping and cracking

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
